mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEACHER(t_id, t_name, t_password, t_auth_level, t_sex, t_phone, t_subject) VALUES(#{tId}, #{tName}, #{tPassword}, #{tAuthLevel}, #{tSex}, #{tPhone}, #{tSubject})
